articles.content:

articles.title: PatchWall Replay 2020 Report Shows That Educational Content Got a Big Boost in Lockdown - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Xiaomi has released its PatchWall Replay 2020 report, which reveals some interesting data about smart TV viewing habits in India, particularly in the face of the lockdowns that dominated much of 2020. Here are some of the key findings from that report.
articles.content: Xiaomi Patchwall 2020 Replay Report was just released by the company, based on usage data gathered from customers who bought Mi TV models. It showed us, among other things, that educational content g… [+5728 chars]
